entry.title: My gaming PC is a VM
entry.summary: This blog post explains how I came to build a server running Proxmox for virtualizing my NAS and Gaming PC on a single physical machine

entry.title: What I learned from running a public Minecraft server
entry.summary: I not only gained lots of technical knowledge when I ran a vanilla survival Minecraft server for multiple years!

entry.title: Dukatia Version 0.20.1 Changelog
entry.summary: Version 0.20.1 is just a minor patch release containing a couple of fixes, mostly around UI problems in the frontend.

entry.title: Dukatia just went 1.0.0
entry.summary: After 3 years of development, Dukatia finally reached version 1.0.0

entry.title: I made a Minecraft server in Rust
entry.summary: I just released version 0.1 of my Minecraft Server I created from scratch entirely in Rust
